page.title: 12EDUCATION
page.content: The village school is still standing but it is now a private house,lived in by the Scott family.My name is Bryonnie Scott. Much of the building has been changed, the one large room was the full height of the building and is now two storeys.In the kitchen there is a wall which was the outside wall. Inside the house there is a windowless cupboard under the stairs which was known as the Punishment Cupboard since children were put there if they were naughty! Today children from Burton Lazars go to school in nearby Melton,firstly to Sherard Primary School then on to Sarson High School.
